sentences.sContent: Conclusions Thus, it is very necessary to improve mothers knowledge on serious symptom of ARI and CDD and family nursing through multiform health education.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conclusions Thus, it is very necessary to improve mothers knowledge on serious symptom of ARI and CDD and family nursing through multiform health education.
sentences.sCn: 结论通过各种形式的健康教育来提高ARI、CDD重症识别知识及家庭护理知识知晓率是十分必要的。

words.tran: 多种文化的；融合或具有多种文化的
多种的；各式各样的；多方面的；多样性的
多种民族的；涉及不同种族的
